description:
You’ll love our home because of the neighborhood, the lighting, the comfy bed, the kitchen, and the coziness. You will have 24 Hour access to rooftop, gym, laundry, and lounge with TV, Air hockey, Pool table and Poker table. Just 2 minutes over the bridge and you are in and Lower East Side!

Our apartment has built-in bluetooth speakers, a security camera, and ac/heat. The building offers a beautiful library, several personal work stations and free coffee in the lobby! Walking distance from shopping, entertainment, drinks and dining!

DUMBO neighborhood offers waterfront access, beautiful parks, independent boutiques, and a cool art scene. Our place is a 5 min walk to the F train at York St, Dumbo Neighborhood, Brooklyn Bridge, Manhattan, and Barclay's Center.
name: Modern 1 Bedroom Luxury Apartment in Dumbo
